Newsela | Senior Data Engineer | Remote 1 - 2 times a week is OK | NYC New York | https://newsela.com

https://grnh.se/u2co4x1 -> Application link

Newsela is a fast-growing startup obsessed with a single ambitious goal: to unlock the written word for everyone.

We provide engaging, relevant content that both teaches and inspires. With hundreds of thousands of teachers signed up, Newsela is already helping kids improve their reading skills in all 50 states and more than 150 countries.

We seek passionate, creative employees with quick minds and warm hearts. If you believe that all students deserve a more rigorous, more personalized learning experience, please apply to join our team.

* Must have skills

- Python

- Some AWS experience (We currently use Redshift, s3, Kinesis)

- SQL

- ETL experience (We currently use Luigi)

* Nice to have

- AWS Spectrum/Athena

- familiarity with data lake

- familiarity with event sourcing

- familiarity with Kafka
